## X25519.getPublicKey() method

Computes a public key given a private key.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getPublicKey(options: {
        privateKey: Uint8Array;
    }): Promise<Uint8Array>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | { privateKey: Uint8Array; } | The options for the public key computation operation. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;Uint8Array&gt;

A Promise that resolves to the computed public key as a Uint8Array.
